Stellar Debris.name: Stellar Debris
Stellar Debris.flavor: Brilliant stellar debris explodes outward from you, burning your enemies.
Stellar Debris.onHit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant and fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target treats all creatures as having concealment.

Minor Gift of Foresight.name: Minor Gift of Foresight
Minor Gift of Foresight.flavor: You can see the doom of your enemies, and that foresight lets you benefit from your boon.
Minor Gift of Foresight.effect: You remove any number of Warlockâ€™s Curses you have placed on your enemies and gain the benefit of your pact boon as if each of those creatures had been reduced to 0 hit points.

Shooting Star.name: Shooting Star
Shooting Star.flavor: You release a starlike spear of light that impales your enemy and enables you to further afflict it with every successful attack you make.
Shooting Star.onHit: 4d10 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.
Shooting Star.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.
